workParagraph: This is byeDebt an iOS application that helps you be in control of your debt. This debt management application will help you effectively eliminate your debt

imgAlt: Album Art Finder screenshot on mockup devices
workParagraph: Album Art Finder uses the Spotify's API to finder album art of the queried artist. This is a Node.js application

imgAlt: Soda Designer screenshot on mockup devices
workParagraph: Soda Designer is made to express an RPC subroutine to a server, after the selecting the style of the soda can, the app creates it server-side and then sends back the png result for download. This is a Node.js application
